sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_A102Y ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ACC_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , GOODS_NM , INSU1_RESID , INSU1_NM , INSU2_RESID_1 , INSU2_NM_1 , INSU2_RESID_2 , INSU2_NM_2 , INSU2_RESID_3 , INSU2_NM_3 , INSU_PAY_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #accNo# , #formCd# , #resid# , #name# , #datCd# , #busnid# , #tradeNm# , #goodsNm# , #insu1Resid# , #insu1Nm# , #insu2Resid1# , #insu2Nm1# , #insu2Resid2# , #insu2Nm2# , #insu2Resid3# , #insu2Nm3# , #insuPaySum# , #pdfDatAppYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_A102Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , ACC_NO=#accNo# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , BUSNID=#busnid# , TRADE_NM=#tradeNm# , GOODS_NM=#goodsNm# , INSU1_RESID=#insu1Resid# , INSU1_NM=#insu1Nm# , INSU2_RESID_1=#insu2Resid1# , INSU2_NM_1=#insu2Nm1# , INSU2_RESID_2=#insu2Resid2# , INSU2_NM_2=#insu2Nm2# , INSU2_RESID_3=#insu2Resid3# , INSU2_NM_3=#insu2Nm3# , INSU_PAY_SUM=#insuPaySum# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ACC_NO=#accNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_A102Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ACC_NO=#accNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ACC_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , GOODS_NM , INSU1_RESID , INSU1_NM , INSU2_RESID_1 , INSU2_NM_1 , INSU2_RESID_2 , INSU2_NM_2 , INSU2_RESID_3 , INSU2_NM_3 , INSU_PAY_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_A102Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ACC_NO=#accNo#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ACC_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , GOODS_NM , INSU1_RESID , INSU1_NM , INSU2_RESID_1 , INSU2_NM_1 , INSU2_RESID_2 , INSU2_NM_2 , INSU2_RESID_3 , INSU2_NM_3 , INSU_PAY_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_A102Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , ACC_NO DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_A102Y WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
